title: Mobile Game-Based Science English Vocabulary and Pronunciation Improvement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and intermediate or higher English reading proficiency
context.additional_context: A course tailored to working professionals' needs for science-related English learning, combining mobile device-supported self-directed study with in-person classes

learning_goals: Learners will acquire 200 basic science vocabulary terms with over 80% accuracy.
Learners will improve pronunciation accuracy of scientific terms by 30% compared to pre-assessment.
Learners will analyze and discuss over five science texts through collaborative learning in a mobile game environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
